name: Sawyer the Squirrel
description:
SAWYER THE SQUIRREL :

You are a red squirrel somewhere in Great Britain, and your goal is to defend your nuts form grey squirrels who are looking to take your nuts, the easy way or the hard way. all you know, is that they will not have your nuts, and are willing to do what it takes to defend them, alongside a cool stick you found, some rocks in a chips bag, and a slingshot you found atop a roof, that some poor child lost, probably. defeat wave after wave, outliving the timer to progress to the next level, until you reach the final level, where you face the biggest threat of them all, a bear. there are 3 levels in total, each stage taking around 1:30 to beat, may the odds be in your favor, brave Sawyer.

Move with WASD,  Jump with Spacebar,  Run with shift, change weapons with 1,2,3, Attack with the left mouse click, survive the onslaught with your skill. you get a new weapon each level. Naked enemies and fully armored enemies have no weaknesses, but the jacket and helmet bearing enemies are weak to rocks and the stick respectively.

This is a game made in Unity, for the class "Interactive Project 1" for UNITEC, in Honduras. it was made in 10 weeks by a team of 6. We decided to upload it for fun, and for anyone and everyone to enjoy.
